___runTime.description: Duration taken to run all the tests, displayed in seconds

___message.description: Details about the series of api tests completed. Also includes any exceptions

___api.description: URL called to perform the api test

___message.description: Describes the outcome of the api test. Includes any exceptions if required

___success.description: true if the api test succeeds or false if the api test fails
True if all the tests passed correctly, otherwise false due to an api test or multiple api test failures
